title: raa raa naavenna
sahitya:
rArA nAvenna muddu gOpAla nAkivvara oka cinna muddu gOpAla



caraNam 1



 kanukoNTi dina dinamu gOpAlayentO tanivi tIradu celuva gOpAla



caraNam 2



 oppulakuppu krSNaA gOpAla prEmamu perigEnu nIpai gOpAla



caraNam 3



 Emi jUcina gAni gOpAla nI mOmu jUcinaTlO gOpAla



caraNam 4



 eppuDu ninnu jUtu gOpAla kannula gappukonnaTlAyera gOpAla



caraNam 5



 siru loppaga galgi gOpAla ciru gajjelu ghalughallu managa gOpAla



caraNam 6



 saraguna rAra vijayagOpAla ninnu shrngArintunu rAra gOpAla



caraNam 7



 rAmadAsu sharaNa gOpAla nA svAmi bhadrAdrivAsa gOpAla
